_header: Though some sayeth that youth ruleth me
Subjects: songs, of complaint; ages of man’s life
_description: On youth and age, ascribed to Henry VIII — four 5-line monoriming stanzas including with this refrain

BLAdd31922.First Lines:
Though sum saith that yough rulyth meI trust in age to
                    tarry…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines:
…That all amend and her an endThus sayth the kyng the eighth
                    harryThough sum [saith that yough rulyth me]
